edu.illinois.cs.cs125.lib.zen

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.illinois.cs.cs125.lib.zen.Point
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ZenShape, ZenSprite

    public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
    Zen point class. A point is a precise location in 2D space. It uses doubles to store precise values for the x and y coordinate, and casts them to integers for use in the graphic systems integer plane. This allows for more complex transformations like rotating and scaling to take place.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Point()
      Create a point at (0, 0).
      Point(double x, double y)
      Create a point at floating point coordinates (x, y).
      Point(int x, int y)
      Create a point at integer coordinates (x, y).
